Title: Open Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Go to the Amazon homepage
Expected Result: Today's Deals page opens

Test Steps: 2. Click on 'Today's Deals'

Title: Select Filters for Headphones and Grocery
Test Steps: 1. On the left side filters, select 'Headphones'
Expected Result: Filtered results for headphones and grocery are displayed

Test Steps: 2. Select 'Grocery'

Title: Select Discount Filter
Test Steps: 1. From the discount part, select '10% off or more'
Expected Result: Only items with at least 10% discount are displayed

Title: Check Pagination
Test Steps: 1. Go to the fourth page using pagination controls
Expected Result: The fourth page loads with the correct items

Title: Select Item from Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Click on any item listed
Expected Result: The selected item's product page opens

Title: Add Item to Cart from Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Click 'Add to Cart'
Expected Result: Item is successfully added to the cart

Title: Validate Cart Items from Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Go to the cart after adding item
Expected Result: The cart displays the correct item added

Test Steps: 2. Verify the item is listed

Title: Check Price of Selected Item
Test Steps: 1. Check the displayed price of the selected item
Expected Result: Price is displayed correctly

Title: Verify Item Availability
Test Steps: 1. Check if the item is in stock
Expected Result: Stock status is displayed accurately

Title: Verify Filter Persistence
Test Steps: 1. After applying filters, navigate away and back to check if they remain active
Expected Result: Active filters are retained when navigating between pages

Title: Check Item Details from Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Click on an item from Today's Deals
Expected Result: Item details are displayed correctly

Test Steps: 2. Verify its details

Title: Check for Reviews on Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Select an item
Expected Result: Reviews and ratings are visible

Test Steps: 2. Verify that reviews and ratings are present

Title: Validate Discount Percentage Display
Test Steps: 1. Click on an item and check the displayed discount percentage
Expected Result: Discount percentage matches the offer

Title: Verify Navigation Back to Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Click 'Back' after viewing an item from Today's Deals
Expected Result: User returns to Today's Deals page correctly

Title: Test Empty Cart After Adding from Deals
Test Steps: 1. Open Today's Deals
Expected Result: Cart is empty after removal

Test Steps: 2. Add an item to the cart
3. Remove it from the cart

Title: Validate Item Comparison from Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Select multiple items and compare their details
Expected Result: Comparison details are displayed correctly

Title: Check for Notification of Low Stock
Test Steps: 1. Add an item to the cart that is low in stock
Expected Result: User receives a low stock notification

Test Steps: 2. Verify the stock notification

Title: Verify Mobile View for Today's Deals
Test Steps: 1. Open Today's Deals in mobile view
Expected Result: Layout is responsive and filters are functional

Test Steps: 2. Check layout and filters

Title: Validate Page Load Time
Test Steps: 1. Open Today's Deals and measure the load time
Expected Result: Page loads within an acceptable time (e.g., < 2 seconds)

Title: Verify Response Time on Filter Selection
Test Steps: 1. Apply a filter and measure the response time
Expected Result: Response time is within acceptable limits (e.g., < 1 second)

Title: Validate Best Seller Filter
Test Steps: 1. Apply 'Best Seller' filter and check for items
Expected Result: Only best-selling items are displayed

Title: Check Search Functionality Under Load
Test Steps: 1. Simulate multiple users applying filters simultaneously
Expected Result: Filters respond correctly under load

Title: Check Browser Compatibility
Test Steps: 1. Open Today's Deals in different browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge)
Expected Result: Today's Deals page loads correctly across all browsers
